notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: M.S.A. and H. designed the experiments, prepared plant extract, performed experiments. M.S.A. drafted the manuscript. S.A.J.S. and M.S.A. performed in silico studies. Y.Q., E.-B.L., B.T.B., K.S. and S.-C.P. revised and improved the manuscript. K.S. and P.S.C. validated and supervised the study. All authors have read and agreed to the published version of the manuscript.
